reviews.review: Its pretty good
This game is a great puzzle game and challenges your spacial awareness. I've heard about this game for years but had never gotten into PC gaming until now after playing Portal.
the brain hurty game
This and portal 2 are probably some of my favourite games ever created

Начнём с того что мне ну о-о-очень зашло. Игра потрясающая, но очень короткая, и да, это главный минус. В остальном всё отлично, головоломки интересные, так же много гличей которые можно использовать для разнообразия в прохождении, сюжет сильно связан в hl.
Рекомендую к прохождению.

Wow this game is good. The puzzles and the map design are phenomenal, and the ending is nice. The game really makes you think of why your there, and there are so many easter eggs. This is another masterpiece from Valve! <3
Very good
Really satisfying game for logical thinking. Would recommend this game along with its sequel :)

Bu muhteşem oyunda bir tesisin içindeyiz ve bir yapay zekanın söyledikleri doğrultusunda elimizdeki portal silahı ile ödülümüz olan pastayı almak için puzzları çözmeye çalışıyoruz.Oynarken acaba gerçekten bir kek var mı ? Neden bunu yapmak zorundayız ? Biz nerdeyiz ? Bu tesisin amacı ne ? Duvarlardaki yazıların anlamı ne? Biz kimiz? gibi soruları kendimize sorduğumuz çok güzel bir oyun.

I like portal series

A mind-bendingly wonderful little game, Portal tests your thinking outside the box, inside the box and in a totally different direction of said box. With a simple story and a robust series of puzzles, it really helps you test your creative thinking without being either too hand-holdy or too complex. Well worth the price if you enjoy a more relaxed, calm experience in gaming!
great game overall
Não tinha jogado antes, mas finalmente joguei, gostei demais bem divertido e me fez usar os poucos neurônios kkkk devem ter morrido uns 3 ou 7 mas passam bem xD

very fun

Gute alte Zeit, mit guten alten Games. Immer noch eine kleine Herausforderung die kleinen, sehr liebevoll gestalteten Levels. Die (un)passend, sarkastischen Kommentare von GLaDOS und die niedlichen kleinen Turrent-Bots, die dir gerne ins Gesicht schiessen. Ein muss für jeden Rätsel Liebhaber. Nur zu empfehlen auch für die kleine Pause zwischendurch, aber leider ohne Kuchen.
Excelente jogo com mecânicas inovadoras e únicas. Só queria que o jogo fosse mais longo, com mais puzzles. Sua sequência atende essa demanda.

Clasico de puzzles!
Ambiente espectacular, simples pero muy buenas mechanicas.
Buenaaardo

This is a great puzzle game. I played Portal 2 before Portal but I love Portal more. One of my most fav. chambers is number 19, because the twist is just so good. But there is a very annoying part when you have to knock turrets off petals using a ball, it was very hard to aim your shots at some turrets. 9/10

Начало одной из лучших видео игр в жанре головоломки, у которой есть и глубокий сюжет со своими тайнами. Но 2 часть получилась куда лучше чем эта, 1 часть была неким экспериментом с движка source физикой порталов. Да и сама физика игры тоже очень хороша. Если вам скучно и для вас список игр в жанре  головоломка закончен то эта игра вам понравится, да и просто пройти что то вечерком. Пополнив коллекцию пройденных игр
Игра реально кошерная

В общем, я уяснил, что огромная лаборатория пытается тебя убить.

Portal was a phenomenal experience, the setting is unique and new, the comedy is always on point and the game makes great use of physics based puzzles while not stretching itself out.The game is fun, funny, short and  enticing to new and veteran layers alike.I can't recommend it enough and I applaud the devs for the well crafted game and experience.
